de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.level

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.level.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Level class. Contains a level tile map and their data. Provides some utility methods.
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BIT_ANIMATED
      Bit which indicates that a tile is animated.
      static int BIT_BLOCK_ALL
      Bit which indicates that a tile blocks everything.
      static int BIT_BLOCK_LOWER
      Bit which indicates that a tile blocks jumping trough it.
      static int BIT_BLOCK_UPPER
      Bit which indicates that a tile blocks falling trough it.
      static int BIT_BREAKABLE
      Bit which indicates that a tile is breakable.
      static int BIT_BUMPABLE
      Bit which indicates that a tile is bumpable.
      static java.lang.String[] BIT_DESCRIPTIONS
      Names of all tile behaviors.
      static int BIT_PICKUPABLE
      Bit which indicates that a tile is pickupable.
      static int BIT_SPECIAL
      Bit which indicates that a tile is special.

        public static Level load(java.io.DataInputStream dis)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Loads and returns a new level from a stream, e.g. from the filesystem.
        Parameters:
        dis - DataInputStream from where the level should be loaded
        Returns:
        New level object with the streams data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IOException occured

        Parameters:

        public final boolean isBlocking(int x,
                 int y,
                 float xa,
                 float ya)
        Returns if a tile at custom coordinates blocks e.g. a sprite.
        Parameters:
        x - X-coord of the tile
        y - Y-coord of the tile
        xa - Acceleration in x-dir of e.g. a sprite
        ya - Acceleration in y-dir of e.g. a sprite
        Returns:
        True if the tile is blocking
